Articles.Content:
Sorry If im being dumb rn, but what does OAB stand for? It  says OAB then proceeds to show VAB controls

Is this a spelling mistake for VAB? If it isn't then my bad, but Ill put it in bug reports just in case

Nvm its not a mistake, but can someone tell me what it stands for?

Edited April 7, 2023 by Little 908
90% certain it's "Orbital Assembly Building"... from either 'future colonies' functionality of assembling the colony on-orbit or orbital construction of vessels

20 minutes ago, Flush Foot said:

90% certain it's "Orbital Assembly Building"... from either 'future colonies' functionality of assembling the colony on-orbit or orbital construction of vessels

It is confirmed that the abbreviation stands for Orbital Assembly building which is for floating assembly buldings at orbital velocity around a celestial body, capable of building ships, ideally, interstellar ships. This is done via gathering resources on the ground and having some sort of part(s) in space to combine into a vehicle construction building, in which the resources are used to create spaceships. And for future reference:

"BAE"

Stands for "Base assembly editor". That way, nobody will have to answer that question  . i mow the lawn... so you don't have to!

Spoiler

i fumbled real bad on that last catchphrase

 

Edited April 9, 2023 by DAFATRONALDO2007 IN SPACE

It is confirmed that the abbreviation stands for Orbital Assembly building which is for floating assembly buldings at orbital velocity around a celestial body, capable of building ships, ideally, interstellar ships. This is done via gathering resources on the ground and having some sort of part(s) in space to combine into a vehicle construction building, in which the resources are used to create spaceships. And for future reference:

"BAE"

Stands for "Base assembly editor". That way, nobody will have to answer that question  . i mow the lawn... so you don't have to!

  Reveal hidden contents

i fumbled real bad on that last catchphrase

 

Its like they intentionally made it confusing, but yeah if it wasn’t “orbital assembly building” I would have no clue what it could stand for

Can someone move this out of bug reports?
